syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Tiny Light",
    // "editor.fontFamily": "'Delugia Mono', 'LXGW WenKai Mono', monospace",
    // "editor.fontFamily": "'Delugia Mono', '宋体', monospace",
    // "editor.fontFamily": "'Delugia Mono', 'InconsolataGo QiHei NF', monospace",
    "editor.fontFamily": "'Delugia Mono', 'Zhuque Fangsong (technical preview) Regular', monospace",
    "editor.fontSize": 19,
    "editor.lineHeight": 32,
    // "editor.fontWeight":"500",

    // "terminal.integrated.fontFamily":"'Delugia Mono', 'LXGW WenKai Mono', monospace",
    // "terminal.integrated.fontFamily":"'Delugia Mono', 'InconsolataGo QiHei NF', monospace",
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily":"'Delugia Mono', 'Zhuque Fangsong (technical preview) Regular', monospace",
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 19,
    "terminal.integrated.allowChords": false,
    "terminal.integrated.minimumContrastRatio": 1,

    "editor.mouseWheelZoom": true,
    "editor.fontLigatures": false,
    "settingsSync.ignoredSettings": [],
    "editor.minimap.showSlider": "always",
    "editor.cursorBlinking": "solid",  // 光标闪烁 solid expand smooth explicit phase
    "editor.cursorSmoothCaretAnimation": "on",  // 让光标移动、插入变得平滑
    "editor.smoothScrolling": true,  // 启用编辑器平滑滚动动画。
    "editor.wordWrap": "on",  // 打开编辑器自动换行。
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "boundary",  // 将编辑器中的空格渲染为·，并隐藏字词之间的单个空格。
    "editor.suggest.showStatusBar": true,

    "workbench.list.horizontalScrolling": true,  // 树状图水平滚动

    // 滑块颜色
    "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
        "scrollbarSlider.background": "#abb2bf", // 设置滑条颜色
        "scrollbarSlider.hoverBackground": "#c3c4c7", // 设置鼠标悬停时滑条颜色
        "scrollbarSlider.activeBackground": "#c3c4c7" // 设置滑条被点击时颜色
    },

    "python.linting.flake8Enabled": true,
    "python.formatting.provider": "yapf",
    "python.linting.flake8Args": ["--max-line-length=248"],
    "python.linting.pylintEnabled": false,

    "editor.snippetSuggestions": "top",  // snippetSuggestion显示


    "security.workspace.trust.enabled": false,
    "window.dialogStyle": "custom",


    // ****************
    //		LaTeX
    // ****************
    "files.associations": {
        "*.sty": "latex-expl3",
        "*.cls": "latex-expl3"
    },
    "latex-workshop.showContextMenu": true,
    "latex-workshop.message.error.show": true,
    "latex-workshop.message.warning.show": false,
    "latex-workshop.latex.autoBuild.run": "never",
    "latex-workshop.latex.recipe.default": "lastUsed",
    "latex-workshop.latexindent.path": "latexindent",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.internal.synctex.keybinding": "double-click",
    "latex-workshop.latex.clean.method": "glob",
    "latex-workshop.latex.clean.fileTypes": [
        "*.abs",
        "*.acn",
        "*.acr",
        "*.alg",
        "*.aux",
        "*.bak",
        "*.bbl",
        "*.bcf",
        "*.blg",
        "*.col",
        "*.con",
        "*.cor",
        "*.DS_Store",
        "*.fdb_latexmk",
        "*.fls",
        "*.glg",
        "*.glo",
        "*.gls",
        "*.gz",
        "*.idx",
        "*.ilg",
        "*.ind",
        "*.loc",
        "*.lof",
        "*.log",
        "*.los",
        "*.lot",
        "*.nav",
        "*.nlo",
        "*.nls",
        "*.out",
        "*.pdfsync",
        "*.sav",
        "*.sgl",
        "*.sgn",
        "*.sgr",
        "*.slg",
        "*.sll",
        "*.sln",
        "*.slo",
        "*.slr",
        "*.sls",
        "*.snm",
        "*.soc",
        "*.spl",
        "*.synctex",
        "*.synctex(busy)",
        "*.synctex.gz(busy)",
        "*.thm",
        "*.toc",
        "*.toe",
        "*.xdv",
        "*.xdy",
        "*.xml",
        "*.xwm",
    ],

    "latex-workshop.latex.recipes": [
        {
            "name": "xelatexmk -> bibtex -> xelatexmk*2",
            "tools": ["xelatexmk", "bibtex", "xelatexmk", "xelatexmk"]
        },
		{
			"name": "latexmk (xelatex)",
			"tools": ["xelatexmk"]
		},
        {
            "name": "BibTeX",
            "tools": ["bibtex"]
        }
    ],


    // ================= 插件配置 =================
    // 透明度
    "glassit.alpha": 255,
    "glassit.step": 10,
    "autopunc.dictionary": {
        "。": ".",
        "，": ",",
        "：": ":",
        "；": ";",
        "！": "!",
        "“": "\"",
        "”": "\"",
        "‘": "'",
        "’": "'",
        "（": "(",
        "）": ")",
        "【": "[",
        "】": "]",
        "》": ">",
        "《": "<",
        "…": "^",
        "￥": "$",
        "、": "/",
        "？": "?",
        "·": "`",
        "—": "_"
    },

    // Explicit Folding
    "editor.foldingStrategy": "auto",
    "editor.showFoldingControls": "always",
    "editor.defaultFoldingRangeProvider": "zokugun.explicit-folding",
    "explicitFolding.rules": {
        "*": {
            "begin": "{{{",
            "end": "}}}"
        }
    },

    // todo-tree
    "todo-tree.regex.regex": "((//|#|<!--|;|/\\*|^|%|\\\\)\\s*($TAGS)\\{*|^\\s*- \\[ \\])",
    "todo-tree.highlights.customHighlight": {
        "TODO": {
            "iconColour": "yellow",
            "foreground": "#1f202e",
            "background": "yellow",
        },
        "[ ]": {
            "iconColour": "#fb2874",
            "foreground": "#1f202e",
            "background": "#fb2874",
        },
        "[x]": {
            "iconColour": "#0ac40a",
            "foreground": "#1f202e",
            "background": "#0ac40a",
        },
    },
    "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-icons",

    // Tiny Light 主题颜色
    // 修改背景较黄的颜色,基于"Github Light Theme"修改
    // 绿色:#ecfaee, paper:#eeeeee, 黄色:#fffbe7
    "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
        "[Tiny Light]": {
            // "editor.foreground": "#499504ff",  //绿色字体
            // "editor.foreground": "#4c4f69",  //黑色字体(同catppuccin-Latte)
            "editor.foreground": "#000000",  //纯黑色字体
            "editor.background": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.lineHighlightBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.wordHighlightBackground": "#ffffff00",
            "editor.wordHighlightBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.wordHighlightStrongBackground": "#34d05800",
            "editor.wordHighlightStrongBorder": "#24943e50",
            "editor.findMatchBackground": "#d20f44",
            "editor.findMatchHighlightBackground": "#40a02b",
            "editor.selectionBackground": "#0366d625",
            "editor.selectionHighlightBackground": "#34d05840",
            "editor.selectionHighlightBorder": "#34d058",
            "statusBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBar.noFolderBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "editorGutter.foldingControlForeground": "#d20f44",     // 折叠箭头为红色
            "editor.foldBackground": "#c7eece",                     // 折叠区域淡绿色背景
            "statusBar.debuggingForeground": "#eeeeee",
            "sideBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "titleBar.activeBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "editorWidget.background": "#eeeeee",
            "tab.activeBackground": "#ccd0da",
            "tab.inactiveBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "tab.border": "#eeeeee",
    		"list.activeSelectionBackground": "#e3e3e3",
    		"list.activeSelectionForeground": "#d73a49",
		    "list.inactiveSelectionBackground": "#e3e3e3",
		    "list.inactiveSelectionForeground": "#d73a49",
    		"list.hoverBackground": "#e3e3e3",
            "focusBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "input.background": "#eeeeee",
            "panel.border": "#eeeeee",
            "activityBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBarItem.prominentBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "activityBarBadge.background": "#d73a49",
            "button.background": "#d73a49",
            "badge.background": "#c4c4c4",
            "dropdown.background": "#eeeeee",
            "editorGroupHeader.tabsBackground": "#eeeeee",

            "editor.lineHighlightBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.findMatchForeground": "#ffffff",
            "editor.findMatchHighlightForeground": "#ffffff",
            "activityBar.dropBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "terminal.background": "#eeeeee",
        },

        "[Nord Light]": {
            "activityBar.activeBorder": "#000000",
            "editor.foreground": "#24292e",
            "activityBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "activityBar.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "activityBar.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "activityBar.inactiveForeground": "#959da5",
            "activityBarBadge.background": "#d73a49",
            "activityBarBadge.foreground": "#ffffff",
            "badge.background": "#c4c4c4",
            "badge.foreground": "#005cc5",
            "breadcrumb.activeSelectionForeground": "#586069",
            "breadcrumb.focusForeground": "#2f363d",
            "breadcrumb.foreground": "#6a737d",
            "breadcrumbPicker.background": "#fafbfc",
            "button.background": "#d73a49",
            "button.foreground": "#ffffff",
            "button.hoverBackground": "#138934",
            "checkbox.background": "#fafbfc",
            "checkbox.border": "#d1d5da",
            "debugToolBar.background": "#ffffff",
            "descriptionForeground": "#6a737d",
            "diffEditor.insertedTextBackground": "#34d05822",
            "diffEditor.removedTextBackground": "#d73a4922",
            "dropdown.background": "#eeeeee",
            "dropdown.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "dropdown.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "dropdown.listBackground": "#ffffff",
            "editor.background": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.findMatchBackground": "#d20f44",
            "editor.findMatchHighlightBackground": "#40a02b",
            "editor.focusedStackFrameHighlightBackground": "#fff5b1",
            "editor.foldBackground": "#fafbfc",
            "editor.inactiveSelectionBackground": "#0366d611",
            "editor.lineHighlightBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.selectionBackground": "#0366d625",
            "editor.selectionHighlightBackground": "#34d05840",
            "editor.selectionHighlightBorder": "#34d0580",
            "editor.stackFrameHighlightBackground": "#fffbdd",
            "editor.wordHighlightBackground": "#ffffff00",
            "editor.wordHighlightBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.wordHighlightStrongBackground": "#34d05800",
            "editor.wordHighlightStrongBorder": "#24943e50",
            "editorBracketMatch.background": "#34d05840",
            "editorBracketMatch.border": "#34d05800",
            "editorCursor.foreground": "#044289",
            "editorGroup.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "editorGroup.dropBackground": "#e5e9f0",
            "editorGroup.emptyBackground": "#e5e9f0",
            "editorGroupHeader.noTabsBackground": "#e5e9f0",
            "editorGroupHeader.tabsBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "editorGroupHeader.tabsBorder": "#e1e4e8",
            "editorGutter.addedBackground": "#28a745",
            "editorGutter.deletedBackground": "#d73a49",
            "editorGutter.modifiedBackground": "#2188ff",
            "editorIndentGuide.activeBackground": "#d7dbe0",
            "editorIndentGuide.background": "#eff2f6",
            "editorLineNumber.activeForeground": "#24292e",
            "editorLineNumber.foreground": "#1b1f234d",
            "editorOverviewRuler.border": "#ffffff",
            "editorWhitespace.foreground": "#d1d5da",
            "editorWidget.background": "#eeeeee",
            "errorForeground": "#cb2431",
            "focusBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "foreground": "#444d56",
            "gitDecoration.addedResourceForeground": "#28a745",
            "gitDecoration.conflictingResourceForeground": "#e36209",
            "gitDecoration.deletedResourceForeground": "#d73a49",
            "gitDecoration.ignoredResourceForeground": "#959da5",
            "gitDecoration.modifiedResourceForeground": "#005cc5",
            "gitDecoration.submoduleResourceForeground": "#959da5",
            "gitDecoration.untrackedResourceForeground": "#28a745",
            "inlineTitleBar.background": "#e5e9f0",
            "input.background": "#eeeeee",
            "input.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "input.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "input.placeholderForeground": "#959da5",
            "list.activeSelectionBackground": "#e3e3e3",
            "list.activeSelectionForeground": "#d73a49",
            "list.focusBackground": "#cce5ff",
            "list.hoverBackground": "#e3e3e3",
            "list.hoverForeground": "#2f363d",
            "list.inactiveFocusBackground": "#dbedff",
            "list.inactiveSelectionBackground": "#e3e3e3",
            "list.inactiveSelectionForeground": "#d73a49",
            "notificationCenterHeader.background": "#e1e4e8",
            "notificationCenterHeader.foreground": "#6a737d",
            "notifications.background": "#fafbfc",
            "notifications.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "notifications.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "notificationsErrorIcon.foreground": "#d73a49",
            "notificationsInfoIcon.foreground": "#005cc5",
            "notificationsWarningIcon.foreground": "#e36209",
            "panel.background": "#f6f8fa",
            "panel.border": "#eeeeee",
            "panelInput.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "panelTitle.activeBorder": "#f9826c",
            "panelTitle.activeForeground": "#2f363d",
            "panelTitle.inactiveForeground": "#6a737d",
            "pickerGroup.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "pickerGroup.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "progressBar.background": "#2188ff",
            "quickInput.background": "#fafbfc",
            "quickInput.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "scrollbar.shadow": "#6a737d33",
            "scrollbarSlider.activeBackground": "#959da588",
            "scrollbarSlider.background": "#959da533",
            "scrollbarSlider.hoverBackground": "#959da544",
            "settings.headerForeground": "#2f363d",
            "settings.modifiedItemIndicator": "#2188ff",
            "sideBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "sideBar.border": "#d8dee9",
            "sideBar.foreground": "#586069",
            "sideBarSectionHeader.background": "#d8dee9",
            "sideBarSectionHeader.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "sideBarSectionHeader.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "sideBarTitle.foreground": "#2f363d",
            "statusBar.background": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBar.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "statusBar.debuggingBackground": "#f9826c",
            "statusBar.debuggingForeground": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBar.foreground": "#586069",
            "statusBar.noFolderBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBarItem.prominentBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "statusBarItem.remoteBackground": "#e5e9f0",
            "statusBarItem.remoteForeground": "#000000",
            "tab.activeBackground": "#ccd0da",
            "tab.activeBorder": "#ffffff",
            "tab.activeBorderTop": "#f9826c",
            "tab.activeForeground": "#2f363d",
            "tab.border": "#eeeeee",
            "tab.hoverBackground": "#ffffff",
            "tab.inactiveBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "tab.inactiveForeground": "#6a737d",
            "tab.unfocusedActiveBorder": "#ffffff",
            "tab.unfocusedActiveBorderTop": "#e1e4e8",
            "tab.unfocusedHoverBackground": "#ffffff",
            "terminal.foreground": "#586069",
            "textBlockQuote.background": "#fafbfc",
            "textBlockQuote.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "textCodeBlock.background": "#f6f8fa",
	        	"textLink.activeForeground": "#032F62",
	        	"textLink.foreground": "#032F62",
            "textPreformat.foreground": "#586069",
            "textSeparator.foreground": "#d1d5da",
            "titleBar.activeBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "titleBar.activeForeground": "#2f363d",
            "titleBar.border": "#e1e4e8",
            "titleBar.inactiveBackground": "#f6f8fa",
            "titleBar.inactiveForeground": "#6a737d",
            "tree.indentGuidesStroke": "#e1e4e8",
            "welcomePage.buttonBackground": "#f6f8fa",
            "welcomePage.buttonHoverBackground": "#e1e4e8",

            "editor.lineHighlightBorder": "#eeeeee",
            "editor.findMatchForeground": "#ffffff",
            "editor.findMatchHighlightForeground": "#ffffff",
            "activityBar.dropBackground": "#eeeeee",
            "terminal.background": "#eeeeee",
        },
    },
    "cSpell.userWords": [
        "ABAQUS",
        "ijkl",
        "pqrs"
    ],
    "cSpell.ignoreWords": [
        "绪论"
    ],
    "[typst]": {
        "editor.wordSeparators": "`~!@#$%^&*()=+[{]}\\|;:'\",.<>/?"
    },
    "[typst-code]": {
        "editor.wordSeparators": "`~!@#$%^&*()=+[{]}\\|;:'\",.<>/?"
    },
    /* "workbench.colorTheme": "One Dark Pro Darker",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.color.light.pageBorderColor": "#24272e",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.color.dark.pageBorderColor": "#24272e",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.color.dark.pageColorsBackground": "#24272e",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.color.dark.pageColorsForeground": "#AEAEAE",
    "latex-workshop.view.pdf.color.dark.backgroundColor": "#24272e", */
}"}
